languages.text: {n}От рыка Абеляра офицер едва заметно вздрагивает.{/n} "Виноваты, Ваша Светлость! Бочки со средством только доставили... мы уже... уже готовы приступить!"

traits.locale_text: {n}От рыка Абеляра офицер едва заметно вздрагивает.{/n} "Виноваты, Ваше Благородие! Бочки со средством только доставили... мы уже... уже готовы приступить!"

languages.text: {n}The officer flinches slightly at Abelard's snarl.{/n} "It is inexcusable, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! The barrels of poison were only just delivered... But we're... we're ready to begin now!"
languages.original_text: {n}От рыка Абеляра офицер едва заметно вздрагивает.{/n} "Виноваты, Ваша Светлость! Бочки со средством только доставили... мы уже... уже готовы приступить!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The officer flinches slightly at Abelard's snarl.{/n} "It is inexcusable, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! The barrels of poison were only just delivered... But we're... we're ready to begin now!"
{n}The officer flinches slightly at Abelard's snarl.{/n} "It is inexcusable, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! The barrels of poison were only just delivered... But we're... we're ready to begin now!"
{n}The officer flinches slightly at Abelard's snarl.{/n} "It is inexcusable, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! The barrels of poison were only just delivered... But we're... we're ready to begin now!"
{n}The officer flinches slightly at Abelard's snarl.{/n} "It is inexcusable, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! The barrels of poison were only just delivered... But we're... we're ready to begin now!"

languages.text: {n}将校はアベラルドに一喝されてわずかにたじろぐ。{/n}「弁解の余地もございません、陛下！毒樽がたった今届いたところでして…であるからして…今すぐ準備にかかります！」
languages.original_text: {n}The officer flinches slightly at Abelard's snarl.{/n} "It is inexcusable, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! The barrels of poison were only just delivered... But we're... we're ready to begin now!"

traits.locale_text: {n}将校はアベラルドに一喝されてわずかにたじろぐ。{/n}「弁解の余地もございません、陛下！毒樽がたった今届いたところでして…であるからして…今すぐ準備にかかります！」

languages.text: {n}听到阿贝拉德的咆哮，那个军官退了一步。{/n}“这简直是太不可原谅了，大人！毒气桶刚刚送到……不过我们……我们现在就可以动手了！”
languages.original_text: {n}The officer flinches slightly at Abelard's snarl.{/n} "It is inexcusable, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! The barrels of poison were only just delivered... But we're... we're ready to begin now!"

traits.locale_text: {n}听到阿贝拉德的咆哮，那个军官退了一步。{/n}“这简直是太不可原谅了，大人！毒气桶刚刚送到……不过我们……我们现在就可以动手了！”

languages.text: {n}El oficial se estremece ligeramente ante el gruñido de Abelard.{/n} «¡Es inadmisible, {mf|milord|milady}! Los barriles de veneno nos acaban de llegar ahora mismo... ¡No hemos podido empezar hasta ahora!».
languages.original_text: {n}The officer flinches slightly at Abelard's snarl.{/n} "It is inexcusable, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! The barrels of poison were only just delivered... But we're... we're ready to begin now!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El oficial se estremece ligeramente ante el gruñido de Abelard.{/n} «¡Es inadmisible, {mf|milord|milady}! Los barriles de veneno nos acaban de llegar ahora mismo... ¡No hemos podido empezar hasta ahora!».

languages.text: {n}Der Offizier zuckt bei Abelards Tadel leicht zusammen.{/n} "Das ist unentschuldbar, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Die Giftfässer wurden gerade erst geliefert ... Aber wir ... wir sind bereit, jetzt zu beginnen!"
languages.original_text: {n}The officer flinches slightly at Abelard's snarl.{/n} "It is inexcusable, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! The barrels of poison were only just delivered... But we're... we're ready to begin now!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Offizier zuckt bei Abelards Tadel leicht zusammen.{/n} "Das ist unentschuldbar, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Die Giftfässer wurden gerade erst geliefert ... Aber wir ... wir sind bereit, jetzt zu beginnen!"

languages.text: {n}La colère dans la voix d'Abélard fait tressaillir l'officier.{/n} « Je vous présente mes excuses, Votre Seigneurie ! Nous venons tout juste de recevoir les barils d'insecticide... mais nous sommes maintenant prêts à commencer ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The officer flinches slightly at Abelard's snarl.{/n} "It is inexcusable, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! The barrels of poison were only just delivered... But we're... we're ready to begin now!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La colère dans la voix d'Abélard fait tressaillir l'officier.{/n} « Je vous présente mes excuses, Votre Seigneurie ! Nous venons tout juste de recevoir les barils d'insecticide... mais nous sommes maintenant prêts à commencer ! »

languages.text: {n}Subay, Abelard'ın söylenmeleri nedeniyle hafifçe irkiliyor.{/n} "Bir bahanem yok {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Zehir varilleri henüz yeni ulaştı ama biz... Biz de şu an başlamaya hazırız!"
languages.original_text: {n}The officer flinches slightly at Abelard's snarl.{/n} "It is inexcusable, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! The barrels of poison were only just delivered... But we're... we're ready to begin now!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Subay, Abelard'ın söylenmeleri nedeniyle hafifçe irkiliyor.{/n} "Bir bahanem yok {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Zehir varilleri henüz yeni ulaştı ama biz... Biz de şu an başlamaya hazırız!"
